jobDescription: At HyperScience we bring AI to the enterprise. Our products help enterprises become more productive, efficient, and competitive by automating various types of office work and reducing bureaucratic burden both on businesses and their customers. We take a heterogeneous approach to AI, using a blend of what are traditionally considered different fields of ML: deep learning, computer vision, and NLP among others. We believe that delivering AI to the enterprise is the key to unlocking new applications of human potential, and we are excited to execute on our plan to do so.We are looking for our first data analyst to supercharge our ML teams by diving deep into the data and surfacing key insights to improve our models and drive better outcomes for our customers and the business.You not only love putting your technical skills to work to obtain quantitative answers, but you also obsess over clear communication of your findings enabled by your structured problem solving approach. You have experience working with product and engineering teams to uncover optimization opportunities and bring data-driven insight to simplify and clarify seemingly intractable problems. You have experience using a broad array of established analytical tools (Jupyter notebooks, pandas dataframes, and good ol SQL and Excel) and a sincere desire to personally develop by exploring burgeoning fields like interpretability for deep learned models.What You'll Achieve: Within the first 30 days:You will understand the product were building, why our customers need it, and where its headedYou will understand our model training and evaluation process and the accompanying analytical frameworks and toolsYou will spot opportunities for improvement and begin formulating ideas on how
